column3: CLR metadata that indicates that the object file contains managed code
Generated FPO debug information (object only, x86 architecture only, and now obsolete)
Includes registered SEH (image only) to support IDL attributes. For information, see "IDL Attributes" in References at the end of this topic.

column6: IMAGE _SCN_GPREL The IMAGE_SCN_GPREL flag should be set for IA64 architectures only; this flag is not valid for other architectures. The IMAGE_SCN_GPREL flag is for object files only; when this section type appears in an image file, the IMAGE_SCN_GPREL flag must not be set.

IMAGE _SCN_GPREL The IMAGE_SCN_GPREL flag should be set for IA64 architectures only; this flag is not valid for other architectures. The IMAGE_SCN_GPREL flag is for object files only; when this section type appears in an image file, the IMAGE_SCN_GPREL flag must not be set.

column5: IMAGE _SCN_GPREL The IMAGE_SCN_GPREL flag should be set for IA64 architectures only; this flag is not valid for other architectures. The IMAGE_SCN_GPREL flag is for object files only; when this section type appears in an image file, the IMAGE_SCN_GPREL flag must not be set.

column3: Registered exception handler data (free format and x86/object only)
column4: IMAGE_SCN_LNK_INFO Contains the symbol index of each of the exception handlers being referred to by the code in that object file. The symbol can be for an UNDEF symbol or one that is defined in that module.

column3: GP-relative initialized data (free format and for ARM, SH4, and Thumb architectures only)
